choose.when: select id, user_id, title, create_time, view, total_like from free_board order by id DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset};
choose.otherwise: select id, user_id, title, create_time, view, total_like from free_board order by total_like DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset};

mapper.update: update free_board set view = view + 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into free_board (user_id, title, content, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now());
mapper.update: update free_board set total_like = total_like + 1 where id = #{id};
update free_board set total_like = total_like - 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into free_comment (board_id, user_id, comment, create_time) values (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{comment}, now());
